website_summaries.verdict: This vest has the highest level of reflective details and is easy to take on and off.
pros: Offered in sizes M to XXL
Designed for all activities and jobs that require safety vests
Double horizontal and single lateral reflective stripes outlined in neon orange trim
Fully compliant with ANSI and ISEA 107 Class 2 Level 2 standards
cons: At nearly eight ounces, this is the heaviest vest on our list

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This vest is worth every penny. I like to ride my bike after work but during the winter it gets dark early. I often notice others wearing dark colors or no lights. Make it easy for drivers to see you. Here are two pictures using a flash from the same distance. One I'm wearing the vest, the other I'm not. Which is which?
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: They Can See Me Now!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this while walking home from the bus at 5:30 when it’s dark. Before I got it, one evening I was walking in the grass area along the roadside and a guy in a truck stopped and said. “Lady, drivers cannot see you! Get something reflective on before you get run over!”. So I ordered this vest. Quality product for the price, fits nicely over my coat. A few nights after I got it, the same guy drove by me and he stopped and said, “I can see you now!” So I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: islandgma

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is bright. They will never miss you in this. Nice fit. I'm 185 lbs, 5'-9" (average build). I usually wear between a large & XL T shirt. I got the XL, and it fits well. Has enough room for a sweater/jacket, but not a thick one. I'm in Cali, so that's perfect for me as I'll usually not have any jacket on under it. If I was in Minnesota and needed to wear a big thick coat under it, I think the XXL would probably fit better.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: If your large order XL
customer_reviews.text: Update: after wearing it for about a week and a half I started to notice that the stitching on some of the vest started to come off and even had a spot where the reflective strip isn’t attached that’s why I brought it down to 3 stars I usually wear a Large shirt and read that the sizing was small on these so I ordered a 2X. If you want it to fit to your body order the XL and if your Gona wear some kind of jacket order the 2X cause it is really big and if you wear a jacket it fits just right
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but zipper is backward
customer_reviews.text: This is the second reflective vest I have purchased. The first one is still working well - I just wanted another one to keep in my camper. The second vest works, but there is a minor problem with quality control. The zipper is installed backwards! Instead of the pull tab being on the right, it is on the left. It works but takes some fiddling since that is not how I am used to having zippers work. This is the reason for demoting from five stars to four. The vest is very reflective. I used it for bicycling and walking which I often do before sunrise. Along with good lights, it helps make me very visible on the bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Best High-visibility Clothing Article I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE vest for high-visibility and it's reasonable rugged, has a zipper and the XXL fits over all my winter coats (and I'm a less-than-slim older guy). The silvery-gray stripes are extremely reflective and in combination with the orange striping and basic yellow/green fabric, you can't get anything more attention getting in any level of lighting. I have been so happy with mine that I ordered a second to save for when this one wears out. I live by a very busy biking trail and walk my grandkids to school across a busy street with no crosswalk so I'm most grateful for it's high visibility and wear it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Pete1313

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, very high visibility
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest in two sizes for summer and winter bicycling. The sizing was accurate. The reflective tape on my existing vest had deteriorated after much use and many washings over several years; time to pitch it. These two new vests have more reflective tape and some additional contrasting color, so I think they will do the job. Since I have just received these vests I cannot comment about their durability and washability. They are a little stiff, but they are also new. I like the zip front. As other reviewers have noted, the vests are made of some sort of plastic mesh, so they should not be dried in a dryer. There are warning labels to that effect.
customer_reviews.author: Martt Harding

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fits well, good material
customer_reviews.text: I do a decent amount of community volunteer work and needed a good vest to be adequately visible when working on the sides of roads or while directing traffic away from where our team is working. This vest fits well, it is durable, and bright (it's the same color as pictured). I have washed it several times and have had no problems with it shrinking or wearing down even while washing on high heat. Also, I haven't been hit by a car so I guess I would say that it is doing a sufficient job at keeping me safe! Based on price and durability, I would recommend this vest to anyone looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: ICantBelieveThisUsernameIsntAlreadyTaken

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.  Everyone Should Have One in Their Vehicle..
customer_reviews.text: These things are not expensive, at least they do not have to be. I'm a retired trooper and apprecaite visibliity on the highways, espcially today when drivers are paying less attention. I have learned to keep these in my vehicles and my never need them. This brand, while not high end or heavy, does the trick. Visible, has a zip front and fits me well. I am 5'09", 180 lbs. and wear a large or medium shirt, depending on the manufacturer (sort of an athletic build) I bought this vest in size "large" and it fits well over a shirt. For winter if wearing a coat, it will be snug.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe 12

customer_reviews.title: Bad apple out of the bunch....
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received my vest. Out of the box and bag. I bought this because it had a decent star rating on it. The front left side of the vest, a 6" section of the orange strip on the very top was like it was never sewn there. Due to priority items...I'm not contacting or sending it back,etc. Took a while to get to me and if I did go through the hassle. It would take a while for a replacement to get to me. My loss. So, just gonna deal with it and hot glue that section. I need it.
customer_reviews.author: INDUSTRIA

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: My friend lost her reflector vest on the subway and no one turned it in to lost and found. She wears for visibility purpose as she walks to the bus stop in the early morning hours. I was so happy that I could surprise her with a new vest. She said it was much better the one she originally had and it fits over her coat perfectly. Thank you for making this product available. JP
customer_reviews.author: JackieP

customer_reviews.title: Good for visibility needs, one size up isn't bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Reflective material showed reflection just from my phone glow when shined at it through a mirror; good coverage around the vest on the reflective tape, and the orange stripes seem helpful. Normally I wear XL cloths, after reading reviews, I chose to go with XXL and, considering I plan to wear a sweatshirt or jacket under it, this turned out to be a good choice after trying it on.
customer_reviews.author: purpletech

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these wonderful bright glowing vests
customer_reviews.text: i'm handicapped and currently confined to a wheelchair or. I bought two of these wonderful bright glowing vests. I put one vest over the back rest of my electric wheelchair so that When I'm driving down the street or on the sidewalk I'm visible from behind. The second that I wear so that I'm visible from the front should you be approaching me from that direction your headlights were filing me and I'll be lit up like a lightbulb. I think it's a great idea to have two of these for my purposes. I think everybody who needs a wheelchair should definitely have these they're much more obvious than a flag on a pole that's attached your wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good for the price. If you are going to wear this over other clothing (jackets) remember to buy up 1-2 sizes to accommodate the additional layers. Size is true if you are only wearing a shirt. I wear this to walk my dog and it works well to increase our visibility. Zipper is good quality as well - it is a left-handed zipper. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Abbate

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice for Bike Commuters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be more visible during my bike commutes. I've gotten a couple remarks that it's 'bright', so it's doing the job. I've been riding in rain/sleet quite a bit lately, and the vest is holding up just fine. I've noticed a few stray threads, but it's not a deal breaker. I'll purchase again if this one gets ruined by the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order SEVERAL sizes larger than normal to fit over sweaters, jacket, etc. I only ordered up ONE size larger and is too small. Light weight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mooselady

customer_reviews.title: A must have safety vest!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I bought a cheap one from Ikea because I thought it was a joke that kids should wear this while riding bike in our cul-de-sac. WRONG! They totally need these! I bought these upgraded ones because it has a zipper and the ones from Ikea don't. When I drove up and saw my kids in the dusk, I knew this was a good purchase. Always safety first!
customer_reviews.author: shopaholicme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first one October 9, 2017 and I finally worn it down enough and ordered a new one. I work construction and have put my vest through some rough days. I ordered a medium - I wear a medium in women's shirts. This vest isn't a tent but just large enough for me to wear my Carhartt jacket over it in the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between a vest that cost over $30.00, and this one. I thought i would try this one first. I'm glad I did! The quality of this vest is better than I had expected. The fit is decent (I bought it a little large, in case I need to wear it over a jacket in the winter, so the shoulders are a bit off) and the reflective stripes are bigger than I thought. It will be a great addition to my work gear, and I am debating buying a second to have as a spare. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Safety vest Great and good value
customer_reviews.text: For this price this jacket is amazing. I bought a large size that would fit over a down jacket. It is very big but fits perfectly over a very big down jacket. Very well-made for this price this jacket is amazing. I bought a large size it would fit over a down jacket. It is very big but fits perfectly over a very big down jacket. Very well-made
customer_reviews.author: toodles233

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to wear in the evening when I sometimes walk in my subdivision. There was a post that the sizes ran small so I bought a XXL where I would normally do XL. It turn out to be the right call XXL fit just fine. Little early for me to talk about durability but for the price it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: New Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, highly visible.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great highly visible vest. I use it while walking my dog early in the morning or at night. It is well made and looks durable with a good quality zip. The sizing is about right, I bought one size up for me and it fits well over a jacket or a hoodie but just as well with just a t shirt in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: English Builder

customer_reviews.title: Highly reflective vest, but sizes on the small size
customer_reviews.text: The GripGlo safety vest is truly very reflective and bright. Perfect to wear over clothes when walking the dogs at night. We ordered 2XL(I wear a large and it fits just right when I wear a sweater and hooded sweatshirt or jacket) but it is quite small so I would have to imagine that all their sizes run on the small size. Highly recommended but you must be weary of the sizing issue.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyWest

customer_reviews.title: A must in every vehicle
customer_reviews.text: IMHO these are a necessity for every vehicle, preferably in the passenger compartment. It is dangerous to exit a vehicle at night on a poorly lit road without some type of high-visibility garment. These vests provide that visibility and appear well made. Get a size which allows placement over a coat, depending upon your climate.
customer_reviews.author: AlanD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but size is way off
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing 2x for years. I consider this similar to a coat. Outerwear. All my 2x coats fit fine. Under that all my 2x shirts fit fine. When I pull this around my torso, it is actually smaller than my shirts and it about 1" away from being able to zip comfortably. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in VA

customer_reviews.title: This vest is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly for motorcycle riding. I usually wear a medium but I got the Large because I wear it over my motorcycle jacket. High visibility in the dark with no street lights. I would recommend it for anyone who is out at night whether riding or running. It helps other commuters slow down as they think you’re a cop on a bike from far away so it keeps everyone aware on the road.
customer_reviews.author: WestLA213

customer_reviews.title: Safety at a good price. Would get again, but larger.
customer_reviews.text: Feel much safer walking at night (and with the sun going down so early anything after I get home from work is at night) with this vest on. Got it when it was nice out. Now that I'm wearing heavy coats I realize that I probably should have gotten a size or so larger. But at least it can be worn unzipped. Good price. Would get again.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: Great for Roadside Safety
customer_reviews.text: We travel in an RV and use these when we're stopped roadside to make ourselves more visible. We purchased slightly larger than necessary sizes so we could use them over winter coats and jackets. Highly visible, both during the day and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Dee NTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible vest for night walkers and joggers
customer_reviews.text: I'm hard to miss while wearing this vest walking before daylight. It is not very breathable, so in warm weather, I tend to perspire more. I would suppose using a breathable fabric would significantly increase the cost. I chose the Large size, although my regular size is medium, and have extra room for layers to be used in cold weather. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L. Henely

customer_reviews.title: Life Saving Reflective Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, bright, affordable. I purchased two of these (one for me and one for my co-worker). I volunteer at the local hospital at the patient drop off / pickup circle. This vest has saved me twice already! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 2XL shirt. Most of my 2XL shirts have room in them so I thought the 2XL safety vest would fit nicely. Well, it does fit, but it is very snug. I can zipper up the front, but am afraid that one good sneeze might bust this thing wide open. Overall I do like it, just wish it was about an inch bigger in the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Dalegend27

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality vest, but size runs small
customer_reviews.text: The vest was delivered on time and meet my expectations except for true fit. I actually wear an XL, but I ordered a XXL because I would be wearing it over a shirt or light jacket. Even at a XXL the vest was tight. Other than that the vest performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brown

customer_reviews.title: Go up in size.  This is cut pretty small for the size advertised
customer_reviews.text: This cut was very small for an XXL. It is lightweight and reflective. I have others in XXL size and this was way smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Karakoudas Redfern

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it as a hall pass for my high school classroom. I can always find the missing kid. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Oviatt

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: The GripGlo Reflective Safety Vest works very, very well! I purchased it for increased safety while walking my two dogs at night on a street with no lighting. Both dogs are black in color and, if I wear dark clothes, none of us are easy to see by people driving on the street. The vest provides good reflection and a bright and obvious color; both features are helpful to the drivers and to my dogs and me. Plus the vest fits, is light weight and easy to put on and take off. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ORDER A SIZE LARGER THAN YOU THINK YOU NEED!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a Large because that is the size I wear, but it wasn't even close to fitting me -gave it to another tech who normally wears small/medium. Ordered a XXL and it fits great without restricting my movement, and even has a little room to fit a light jacket underneath. Quality is good, not great - but you cannot beat the price. Biggest complaint - Amazon Prime shipping actually took 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Tech1138

customer_reviews.title: Sizing - not as others posted
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews, folks shared that these ran really small - this was not the case for the Large and Extra Large that I purchased. If anything they ran large compared to others I have purchased. I am 5'8", 158 pounds and when wearing a winter cold weather coat, the large is just too big. Totally different experience from what others stated. these are very good quality vests and the reflective nature of the material is really good. I have no idea why they put the zippers on the wrong side (as in how a laddies jacket might be). That is likely the result of a design error.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a good quality product, and the reflective strips are very prominent and look as though they will have excellent visibility. I would advise ordering it TWO sizes larger than the size you usually wear in clothing. I am a medium in most clothes and ordered a Large, which looks like it will not be big enough to fit over a winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Untitled

customer_reviews.title: Very Reflective
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda shocked when I received the vest. The quality is very good. It has a lot of reflective material. My only concern is, I feel it may run a little bit smaller than other vests. Because of the quality, and the fact that I want it now, I will not be returning it for a larger one. I will just loose a few pounds. All in all, great product!!
customer_reviews.author: DLF Dup24chv

customer_reviews.title: Mother Knows Best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to wear when she walks the dog. She lives in an urban neighborhood without sidewalks or streetlights so it is very dark but with a fair amount of traffic. She also wears mostly black or dark clothing. I got a large size so she could wear it over her coats or jackets. She says it works well. Remember listen to your Mother!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Harding

customer_reviews.title: Works for me while riding a bike
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I use it while riding a bike to aid in visibility. The medium size fits over my coat - which is what I was looking for. I can easily toss in my gym bag when not using. I can't speak to durability as I haven't had it for long.
customer_reviews.author: CMB80

customer_reviews.title: i love how it bright it is
customer_reviews.text: i love how it bright it is...i can see this person when he wears it now. he is an older vet that rides an electric wheelchair down the street. he has been hit by a car in the past and so i bought it for him and he wears it all the time and we can see him! Thanks it is perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but small, for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and will serve its purpose to make me more visible while walking. However, size ran small and i cannot zip it closed. Roomy on top, but small at waist. More of an athletic men’s fit. 2XL largest size available.
customer_reviews.author: OzBound

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for Christmas presents. One for my son and one for my husband. Good to be visible if you break down or stop to help someone. I got XXL so it would fit over their coats. Seems to be well made items.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: For our car emergency kits.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the size mediums for my husband and I to go in our emergency car kits. They are very bright and reflective! Easy zip up in front too. I wish they also came in sizes small and extra small as well because a medium fits my over size foot husband and I know a lot of people smaller than him and they should be able to buy a safety vest too.
customer_reviews.author: ScotFlowerTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Great price, amazing craftmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's construction birthday party. Yes, it was too big- of course- it's for adults, but he absolutely loved it!! and wears it all the time. It is so much fun! Extremely well made! The zipper, the reflection tape, all so well made. It arrived quickly and was a fun addition to his party! Best price I found for an authentic construction vest, nothing cheesy or flimsy about it!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Visibility
customer_reviews.text: I love the vest in terms of brightness and visibility; the second large stripe around the lower abdomen makes it make it second to none when compared to other vests in its class. The zipper seems rugged enough but I would have preferred a break away vest instead. I only wish amazon had them in 4XL and 5XL so I can wear them over my winter coat for my morning walks
customer_reviews.author: cmdr_iceman

customer_reviews.title: No Pockets! Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: No POCKETS!!! Buy another, just assumed it had pockets. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your car!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest. I keep it in the car for when I need to pull over and get out for some reason, be that checking on a disabled motorist or working on my own car. The zipper is great. Mostly I have used this for Sunday walks along the road of about 4 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: A must for walking at night
customer_reviews.text: Was initially advised by my community newsletter to buy one of these when walking my dog at night. I didn't think I needed it but now that I have it I won't go out at night without it. Feel much safer in the car lights. In fact Was stopped last night by a woman driving by who saw me and told me she thought that it was the greatest thing because it was easy to see me at night.
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Some sizing details in this review
customer_reviews.text: There are many comments on how this is sized and how it fits so I thought I'd share some specifics. I'm 5'10", 165 pounds, wear a 40 regular sport coat. I bought the XXL and it fits comfortably over my winter coat. If I didn't have to wear it over my coat, XL might have worked but I don't mind a little extra room for the vest. Very good quality first impression.
customer_reviews.author: TC49

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: If you’re someone who is constantly stopping to help animals out of the road this vest is for you - I personally wouldn’t exercise in it but if you want to be seen I. The dark it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL and it felt like a Medium. It was for a costume that worked out at the end but would have preferred it to be the size I requested. Overall: Small but got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ohayon

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE AND BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, well made safety vest! I bought this vest for my hubby to wear when he walks the dog early morning and at night. Since we live on a road with no sidewalks, safety is of the utmost importance. This vest is bright and reflects very well ...and it fits well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn this vest once so I can't speak to durability. However, I like its fit, construction, and materials. If someone can't see me while I walk along the road during the day, evening, dusk, or night, they are severely seeing impaired!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the negative reviews about this being too small. I bought the XX-L to wear over work clothes. It is at best a Large and probably closer to a medium.
customer_reviews.author: TomB VA

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even zip up over undershirt, too tight. No way to wear or shirt or light jacket. Like material, reflectivity, etc. But not an XXL. Can't use. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy_Matters

customer_reviews.title: These seem like good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem like good quality. I bought one for each of my cars and one for my daughter as an emergency tool in case anyone breaks down at night or day I also bought the Seirus Innovations cap in case it's cold out. They are both very bright and high visibility. I bought an XL in the vest in case it has to go over a jacket or coat.
customer_reviews.author: His child

customer_reviews.title: Great safety vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear on morning walks in my woods with my dogs (during hunting season). I also walk w/o them on the road and wanted high visibility during inclement weather. It’s easy to get on and off, and cars seem to see me from a distance and give me a wide berth. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: High visibility, light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: High visibility, light weight and comfortable. Easy to zip. I bought it one size bigger to put over my winter jacket. Good value. A pocket or two would be a valued addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glow in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: I got a XXL size for myself when I walk my dog in the mornings and at evenings. Works great, I'm about 6'2" and 200 lbs. When I'm wearing a coat (temp around 40 F) the reflective safety vest has a little bit of play. When I'm wearing a heavier coat (temp around 20 F) the reflective safety vest is snug around my heavy coat. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: rjc

customer_reviews.title: Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: Product was used for riding my bike at night, since it is so hot here during the summer
customer_reviews.author: mwamazin

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Stored in motor-home in case we have trouble while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Pamala K McGahan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Buy one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vest! I bought this in a large size because it was said that they run small. Typically, I take a medium. I'm 6' tall, 150 lbs - slender. The large size is perfect for me. Seems to be constructed well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: I recommend ordering 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: For the price, item is well made. It runs small so be sure to order the next size up. If you plan to wear over a coat or heavy jacket, I recommend ordering 2 sizes up. Material is highly reflective and very visible in the evening. In the past I've ordered safety vest from several companies on Amazon and in my opnion, this one is the best buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Safe Recumbent Cycling
customer_reviews.text: I got a size Medium so that we could wear over down jackets when riding in cold weather. I probably would have been happier with size Small. These are generously sized. Bright, lightweight, they definitely increase our visibility!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn it yet, but it seems to be well made, and stacks up next to previous one's I've owned- I feel it should do the Job very well.
customer_reviews.author: CC_Rider

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Product looks like good quality and sizes are about right. Have not actually put them to the test for any time yet but so far all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mean Man

customer_reviews.title: ATTENTION
customer_reviews.text: I believe the sizing may have been fixed. Unfortunately for me I listened to all the reviews and ordered a large even though I usually wear a small and this is much too big. Since I don't believe in wasting money i will be wearing it to work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but small
customer_reviews.text: The vest appeared to be made well and durably. Size was smaller than I expected. If you're planning to wear it over bulky clothes (sweatshirts, jackets, etc), be sure to order several sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: XXl was very small
customer_reviews.text: Order big, way big. XXL would not fit over a jacket & barely fit over me. Supposed to be retro-reflective but it really didn't seem like it reflected much. Thanks Amazon for taking the return!

product_meta.title: GripGlo Reflective Safety Vest, Bright Neon Color with 2 Inch Reflective Strips - Orange Trim - Zipper Front, X-Large
product_meta.description:
Size:X-Large

Stay Safe, Be Seen!

GripGlo high visibility safety vests or ‘hi vis vests’ improves visibility to prevent injury to those who wear it. This reduces the risk of serious accidents at the job for construction workers, traffic police and others working in ports, airports, yards, emergency services and utility jobs. This is true by day and night and in inclement weathers when vision is compromised. Reflective vests aid in safety in high traffic areas for cyclists, motor cyclists, crossing guards as well as security personal.

Safety vests are classified by Ansi into separate classes; Class 2 safety vests are for work areas where workers have to stand out against a multi colored background this includes construction workers, surveyors, security guards, safety patrols and forklift operators. Neon vests offer extra visibility and are highly beneficial to use when cycling, running or even walking. Fluorescent yellow vests reduce the risk of a collision crash by increasing the distance at which drivers will detect you.

Reflective Vest - Orange trim edging on the double horizontal reflective stripes is designed to increase visibility and goes all around from front to back. This is perfect for nighttime bike riding as the reflective strips are easily picked up by a car’s headlights. 

Zip It Up - Don’t waste time with the easy on zipper closure, just zip it up!

Lightweight - This lightweight safety vest, made of 100% Polyester material, is perfect to wear while running or when riding your motorcycle. 

Sizing - The GripGlo high visibility safety vest has a helpful size chart with the measurements for four sizes, medium, Large, X Large and XX Large this will ensure that you order the right size for men and women, adults and kids. If you did order the wrong size we offer Hassle Free Returns!

Size up your high visibility vest for cold weather wear over top your winter jacket!
feature_bullets: This safety vest is lightweight and designed for high visibility to keep you safe for Motorcycle, Running/Jogging, Bike/Bicycle Riding, Construction worker, Surveyor, Traffic Crossing Guard, Police, EMS, Security, - Essential for Your Car/Auto Rescue & RV Roadside Emergency Kit.
Double horizontal reflective strips on front and back of vest for maximum visibility.
Specially designed orange trim edging on reflective material which substantially increases day & night visibility.
In full compliance with ANSI/ISEA 107-2010 Class2/Level 2 standards.
FULL COMPLIANCE WITH ANSI/ISEA 107-2010 CLASS 2/LEVEL 2 – GripGlo High Visibility Safety Vest meets the ANSI and ISEA standards that outline performance specifications for high visibility glowear.
